t: The Mysterious Case of the Missing Buy Box
s: October 1, 2019 - More than 80% of all Amazon sales come from the Buy Box—the section on the right side of a product page with the Add to Cart button. The Buy Box is the main source of sales on both desktop and mobile devices.
